1.title: Fashion One Correspondent Search: Benelux
1.plot: From Antwerp to Amsterdam to Brussels, Fashion One scours Benelux in search for its next correspondent. After the open auditions, host, Adam Child, welcomes the top 9 contestants to the Royal Palace on 'De Meir' where the contestants meet the judges who will decide their fate throughout the competition. From 9, only 5 will proceed to the next round and it relies on a single question: "Why you think you deserve to be the next Fashion One Correspondent?"

2.title: Fashion One Correspondent Search: Benelux
2.plot: The Top 5 moves on to the next round but due to an unforeseen incident, one contestant has to drop out of the competition, leaving only 4 hopefuls to continue in their quest. On the exercise challenge, the contestants have to do a walk-through interview through a series of obstacles (balloons, pies, crates, tire threads) along the path. They will have to show that they can keep control over their nerves while they're interviewing while avoiding these obstructions. The episode wraps up with a major challenge wherein the contestants will have to make a 30 min piece ...

3.title: Fashion One Correspondent Search: Benelux
3.plot: How would you sell an apple? This is the exercise challenge Adam gives the contestants. Each correspondent hopeful is given an inanimate object that she has to convince Adam to want it. This task would be helpful on the major challenge as each contestant are sent back to their hometown and asked to produce a 2-3 minute report on something exciting happening at their own backyard. Tog ether with their cameraman, the contenders will have to display her character and show the judges whether or not the she is in tune with the happenings in this fashion capital.

4.title: Fashion One Correspondent Search: Benelux
4.plot: On the bustling streets of Antwerp, the contestants are given an exercise called "Street Style." The contestants have 15 minutes to stop and interview people and discuss their style/fashion, make them do a catwalk, as well as "borrow" a piece of their clothing. In this challenge we can see the contestants approach when dealing with the unassuming public. On the major challenge, "Red Carpet Duo" the remaining contestants are paired up to produce a 30 min report covering the Miele Catwalk Red Carpet event. This report will challenge the contestants to share the screen ...

5.title: Fashion One Correspondent Search: Benelux
5.plot: A Fashion One Correspondent must have a good sense of style. A stylist was sent by the producers to invade the closets of the remaining 3 contestants. Each contestant was given advice on what to wear when covering an event and what apparel needs to be thrown in the trash. The contestants then had an improv class with an acting and dance instructor to help them be more spontaneous and test their ability to think quickly and be creative. As a final challenge, the top 3 will have a one on one interview with Belgian photographer Selena, not knowing that the subject is an ...

6.title: Fashion One Correspondent Search: Benelux
6.plot: It's the finals and the top 4 meets up to reflect on their experiences throughout the competition. Do they get still along? Are they feeling incredibly competitive? Is there leftover drama? Are they happy with the remaining 2 contestants who made it to the finals? The final challenge takes us to the fashion house of RA where the finalists will be interviewing the brand's co-founder Romaine Brown as well as the fashion brand itself. You think this is easy? The contestants have to do the interview live in front of the judges where every off cam mistakes will be observed...

1.title: Fashion One Correspondent Search London
1.plot: After selecting the lucky few from thousands of applications, the judges meet in London to hear who made the final cut and are picking out those that'll make it to the next round. The girls are already facing their first challenge and will soon have to show their personality and spunk in a free-style presentation.

2.title: Fashion One Correspondent Search London
2.plot: The girls will have to fight their inhibitions and prove that they have style and grace by performing in a Burlesque show.

3.title: Fashion One Correspondent Search London
3.plot: The remaining contestants will be thrown in the street of London with their own camera crew to produce a street style Price. The twist: they will have to do it at night during a club night.

4.title: Fashion One Correspondent Search London
4.plot: The girls meet Fashion sensation Matthew Zorpas and will have to work in pairs. Wearing some ensembles by the top emerging designers, they'll have to use their street smarts to find the secret location in London to interview the artists.

5.title: Fashion One Correspondent Search London
5.plot: For the semi-finals, the remaining girls will be thrown at the mercy of the very glamorous Vogue Fashion Night Out and will have to produce the best coverage to come out on top.

6.title: Fashion One Correspondent Search London
6.plot: On their final round, our two remaining victors will attend the most coveted week in fashion: London Fashion Week. It's their last chance to shine and prove to the judge they have what it takes to get the job done. Oh, and handle the craziness of London Fashion Week.

imdb.plot outline: Fashion One Correspondent Search is a six episode reality-based competition series with the mission to find a fashion correspondent in each of the major fashion capitals of the world. In the same vein as American Idol, Fashion One Correspondent Search is having open castings in each respective city. After two casting shows, five finalists will be invited to take part in the competition. The show seeks to develop each of the potential talents into a perfect match for Fashion One. The series is a combination of in-the-field workshops with host Archie Brooksbank, and challenges to test their reporting skills. The finale is a one-hour show that will test the hopeful correspondents one last time in front of a live audience, and will feature a fashion show with the city's hottest designers. The competition peaks as each candidate scurries to get the best coverage. A fashion correspondent is not just a pretty face - it's someone who can get the exclusive access and deliver the story with style and confidence.
